author: Cody Meltdown

text:
I won't spoil much of this game for those who played it yet, but I what I can tell you is that it has awesome music. Both its music and game mechanics makes it into an enjoyable Zelda experience, certainly one that is worth paying attention to.

Also, thanks for uploading this calming tune, SupraDarky. :)
Greetings from Norway and Europe!

author: Hawlo

text: Well I got the game today and started playing it about an hour ago. The game is still on too, I can see Link standing around in Skyloft if I turn my head to the left. So yeah, I've been on an almost complete media blackout for this game so it's exciting. I went with Skyloft since that's where I'm at and I already really like it (sounds like a mix of Wind Waker and Animal Crossing). I'm sure I'll like a lot more tracks that will end up in this list.
author: SupraDarky
